mapper.update: update work_overtime set award=#{award},type=#{type} where data=#{data}
mapper.select: select l.log_date,u.name,u.phone,w.type,l.log_award from work_overtime w left join `logs` l on l.log_date=w.`data` left join user u on l.log_userId=u.phone where l.log_date=#{time} and l.log_state=1
